n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
k=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the index:"))
b=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  if(arr[i]%%k==0){
    b[i]=arr[i]%/%k
  }else{
    b[i]=(arr[i]%/%k)+1
  }
}
print(sum(b))
